trends: There has been one other sighting in Hahira
There were no other sightings in Hahira on or around January 15th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister in law andyself were sitting on the front porch talking and out of the corner of my eye I seen lights and thought at first a plane was going down but then realized no noise at all! We went out into the yard to get a better look and then there were more. It would start as a bright light and then seperate off one another. They were bright lights and at one point looked as though they were getting closer and closer but then would just disappear. There were about 4-6 each time but never landed just disappeared. They would just appear as if out of the clouds. We have never seen anything like this before and are just baffled by it. Any information would be great!
Summary: light appeared in sky from nowhere then disappeared after seperating from original light.
